name: Guardian Starship
description:
For hundreds of years the stars guarded the seal. However, as time passed the tradition was forgotten. When the stray breaks the seal they cause havoc in space. Now it’s up to you to reseal the stray and save the day.

We are following the ten seconds theme.

Credits:

All of the art (apart from the star and the seal) was made by Marianne Bjørnes. 

The boss battles music http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto and the looped version used https://opengameart.org/content/fast-fight-battle-music-looped.

Start screen music https://opengameart.org/content/crazy-space. 

Tutorial music https://opengameart.org/content/at-the-end-of-hope.

Level music https://opengameart.org/content/simple-bgm-loop.
